Message: The user completes the submission of the form
My ads campaign is still pending

If your ad campaign is pending, it might be due to your account being new and not yet verified. To proceed with the verification process, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Account Email
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners.

Currently, ad credits or funds within your News Break account cannot be withdrawn or transferred to another account. They are intended to be used solely within the account they were originally issued to for advertising purposes.
I want to speak with an agent
I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away. If there's something specific you need assistance with, feel free to ask!

I understand you're eager to get your ads approved! If your ad is pending due to business verification, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Account Email
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. We appreciate your cooperation in maintaining a secure and compliant advertising environment for all our partners. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.
